location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: There is an Abstract of Contents on folios 149-150, numbered 1-15.

mods.abstract: Letter and Enclosures to HM Secretary of State for India, dated 17 October 1871 concerning affairs at Bunder Abbass [Bandar Abbas].The papers cover: complaints about oppressive revenue farming at Bandar Abbas; the proposed lease of Bandar Abbas from the Government of Persia to Syud Toorkee [Sayyid Turkī bin Sa‘īd Āl Bū Sa‘īd, Sultan of Muscat and Oman]; the support of the Government of India for the proposal; and an intelligence report by the British Agent at Shiraz, dated 4 July 1871, on law and order and economic affairs at Bandar Abbas.The correspondence is dated 4 July to 7 October 1871.
